txt.en: Now that some cleansing has been done against the vile insects of Moria, the effort must be ever maintained. Gredbyg do not ever truly leave a place, but their numbers should be quelled, lest the caves are overrun once more. To prevail against the gredbyg of Moria will be a tireless task.
The chittering gredbyg in the black pit that is Moria ever dismay the dwarves with their oppressive numbers. They seem to be a bottomless force in the forsaken halls of Khazad-d√ªm.
